data.message: any true shady fan should be fucking pissed. his setlist will be so watered down to please all the poppy rihanna fans. only going to be playing recent shit and radio hits. this is bullshit

replies.message: he comes on after rihanna..he doesn't water down shit for them...the rihanna fans will come to see her and deal with his regardless...u realize this concert is in detroit right?
and LA and NY. Obviously it will be explicit but there will be minimal songs from the sslp, mmlp or eminem show that arent singles

A true shady fan would appreciate seeing this legend live. Look at you complaining like a lil bitch. I went to his concert a month ago along with 360, david dallas, action bronson and J cole. And eminem didnt water down shit he played heaps of old songs. You just sound like a ass!
Fuck yeah that concert was baadass!
Couldn't agree more I seen Eminem Recently and he was fucking brilliant!!  And it was eminem concert they were part of it.... He was amazing
even it was watered down it would still be better than any other rap concert out there right now
Naming a tour based on ONE song?  yes that's bullshit that song is pop when people don't wanna hear pop they wanna hear rap.
